text:
You can get just about any of your essential household needs here. The shop offers food, beverages, fresh produce, dairy products, frozen foods, instant foods, healthcare products and more!

New management has taken over the shop and is making some changes, mainly reorganisation of the shop as well as updating how they operate.

The boss has mentioned that he tries to provide all the essentials that residents in the neighbourhood would need at a competitively low price whenever possible.

The boss is willing to take suggestions and feedback on his shop and the offerings/services they provide.
